statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;

SELECT MIN(energy_usage) FROM energy_consumption;

SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, MIN(energy_usage) AS min_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY device_id;

SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY energy_usage ASC;

SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption LIMIT 5 OFFSET 5;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;

SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage < 50;

SELECT device_id, MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS average_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE device_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-31';
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(DISTINCT timestamp) AS total_timestamps FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE device_id LIKE '123%';
SELECT device_id, MIN(timestamp) AS earliest_timestamp FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT device_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT * FROM energy_devices;
SELECT device_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_devices;
SELECT * FROM energy_readings;
SELECT reading_time, energy_value FROM energy_readings;
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id;
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings USING(device_id);
SELECT device_name, SUM(energy_value) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings USING(device_id) GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, MAX(energy_value) AS max_energy_consumed FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings USING(device_id) GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, MIN(energy_value) AS min_energy_consumed FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings USING(device_id) GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, AVG(energy_value) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings USING(device_id) GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(reading_id) AS total_readings FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings USING(device_id) GROUP BY device_name;

SELECT device_name, reading_time, energy_value FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT device_name, reading_time, energy_value FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id WHERE energy_value > 100;
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id ORDER BY energy_value DESC;
SELECT device_name, AVG(energy_value) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings USING(device_id) GROUP BY device_name HAVING AVG(energy_value) > 50;
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id WHERE device_name LIKE 'AC%';
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id WHERE device_name IN ('Fridge', 'TV');
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT device_name FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_devices;
SELECT device_name FROM energy_devices WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT device_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_devices WHERE energy_consumption BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id;
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices INNER JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id WHERE energy_value > 50;
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices LEFT JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id;
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices RIGHT JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id WHERE energy_value < 50;
SELECT device_id, MAX(energy_value) AS max_energy_value FROM energy_readings GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_name, SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_energy_consumption FROM energy_devices GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM energy_devices;
SELECT AVG(energy_value) AS avg_energy_value, MIN(energy_value) AS min_energy_value, MAX(energy_value) AS max_energy_value FROM energy_readings;
SELECT device_name, AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_energy_consumption FROM energy_devices GROUP BY device_name HAVING avg_energy_consumption > 50;
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM energy_readings WHERE energy_value > 50);
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices WHERE device_id NOT IN (SELECT device_id FROM energy_readings WHERE energy_value < 50);
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_readings WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_readings WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM reading_time) = 3;
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_readings WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM reading_time) = 2022;
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_readings WHERE DATE_PART('hour', reading_time) BETWEEN 8 AND 17;
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_readings WHERE energy_value = (SELECT MAX(energy_value) FROM energy_readings);
SELECT device_name, energy_value FROM energy_devices WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM energy_readings WHERE energy_readings.device_id = energy_devices.device_id);
SELECT * FROM energy_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM energy_devices;

SELECT log_id, device_id, log_timestamp FROM energy_logs;

SELECT type_id, device_type FROM device_types;
SELECT device_id, device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices;
SELECT log_id, device_id, log_timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_logs;
SELECT type_id, device_type FROM device_types WHERE type_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM energy_devices WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT device_id, device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'F%';
SELECT device_id, device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices WHERE energy_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM energy_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_consumed) AS average_energy_consumed FROM energy_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM energy_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, MIN(energy_consumed) AS min_energy_consumed FROM energy_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, log_timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_logs WHERE DATE(log_timestamp) = '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, log_timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM energy_devices WHERE energy_usage > 100
SELECT device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices WHERE device_name = 'Solar Panel'
SELECT device_name, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_devices GROUP BY device_name
SELECT device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices ORDER BY energy_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_logs ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_logs.device_id
SELECT device_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_logs ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_logs.device_id
SELECT device_name, log_timestamp FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_logs ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_logs.device_id WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT device_name, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_usage FROM energy_devices GROUP BY device_name HAVING AVG(energy_usage) > 50
SELECT device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM energy_logs WHERE energy_consumed > 50)
SELECT device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices WHERE device_id NOT IN (SELECT device_id FROM energy_logs)
SELECT device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices LEFT JOIN energy_logs ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_logs.device_id
SELECT device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices RIGHT JOIN energy_logs ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_logs.device_id
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM energy_devices INNER JOIN device_types ON energy_devices.device_id = device_types.type_id
SELECT device_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_logs ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_logs.device_id WHERE device_type = 'Appliance'
SELECT device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_logs ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_logs.device_id GROUP BY device_name HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 10
SELECT device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_logs ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_logs.device_id WHERE device_name LIKE '%Fridge%'
SELECT device_name, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_devices GROUP BY device_name HAVING total_energy_usage > 500
SELECT device_name, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_usage FROM energy_devices GROUP BY device_name ORDER BY avg_usage DESC
SELECT device_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_logs ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_logs.device_id WHERE energy_consumed > energy_usage
SELECT device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_devices UNION SELECT device_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_logs
SELECT device_name, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_logs ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_logs.device_id GROUP BY device_name HAVING log_count > 5
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT * FROM DeviceDetails;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM DeviceDetails;
SELECT * FROM LocationDetails;
SELECT device_id, location_name FROM LocationDetails;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionHistory;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionHistory;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionHistory;

SELECT EnergyConsumptionData.device_id, DeviceDetails.device_name, LocationDetails.location_name, EnergyConsumptionHistory.energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData, DeviceDetails, LocationDetails, EnergyConsumptionHistory WHERE EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = DeviceDetails.device_id AND DeviceDetails.device_id = LocationDetails.device_id AND LocationDetails.device_id = EnergyConsumptionHistory.device_id;

SELECT EnergyConsumptionData.device_id, DeviceDetails.device_name, EnergyConsumptionData.timestamp, EnergyConsumptionData.energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData INNER JOIN DeviceDetails ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = DeviceDetails.device_id;

SELECT EnergyConsumptionData.device_id, DeviceDetails.device_name, EnergyConsumptionHistory.timestamp, EnergyConsumptionHistory.energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN DeviceDetails ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = DeviceDetails.device_id JOIN EnergyConsumptionHistory ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = EnergyConsumptionHistory.device_id;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, MIN(energy_consumed) AS min_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, DAY(timestamp) AS day, MONTH(timestamp) AS month, YEAR(timestamp) AS year FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT device_id, DATE(timestamp) AS date, HOUR(timestamp) AS hour, MINUTE(timestamp) AS minute, SECOND(timestamp) AS second FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN DeviceDetails ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = DeviceDetails.device_id;
SELECT device_id, device_name, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData LEFT JOIN DeviceDetails ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = DeviceDetails.device_id;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id HAVING SUM(energy_consumed) > 1000;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_name FROM DeviceDetails JOIN LocationDetails ON DeviceDetails.device_id = LocationDetails.device_id;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM DeviceDetails WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp');
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT device_id, device_name, COUNT(device_id) AS total_records FROM DeviceDetails GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id HAVING AVG(energy_consumed) > 50;
SELECT device_id, MAX(energy_consumed) - MIN(energy_consumed) AS energy_range FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed, COUNT(device_id) AS total_records FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id;

SELECT device_id, device_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN DeviceDetails ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = DeviceDetails.device_id GROUP BY device_id;

SELECT device_id, device_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN DeviceDetails ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = DeviceDetails.device_id WHERE energy_consumed > 50 GROUP BY device_id;

SELECT device_id, location_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN LocationDetails ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = LocationDetails.device_id GROUP BY device_id, location_name;

SELECT device_id, location_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN LocationDetails ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = LocationDetails.device_id WHERE energy_consumed > 100 GROUP BY device_id, location_name;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) AS unique_devices FROM DeviceDetails GROUP BY device_name;

SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM SmartHomeDevices;
SELECT device_id, manufacturer FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_id = '4321';
SELECT * FROM DeviceTypes;
SELECT type_id, device_type FROM DeviceTypes WHERE device_type = 'Lighting';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_device_types FROM DeviceTypes;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, contract_type FROM EnergyProviders WHERE provider_name = 'PowerCo';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_providers FROM EnergyProviders;
SELECT * FROM EnergyRates;
SELECT rate_id, rate, start_date, end_date FROM EnergyRates WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(rate) AS average_rate FROM EnergyRates GROUP BY type_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN SmartHomeDevices ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = SmartHomeDevices.device_id;
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeDevices JOIN DeviceTypes ON SmartHomeDevices.device_id = DeviceTypes.type_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyRates JOIN EnergyProviders ON EnergyRates.provider_id = EnergyProviders.provider_id;

SELECT device_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_energy > 500;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT device_name, location FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM SmartHomeDevices JOIN DeviceTypes ON SmartHomeDevices.device_id = DeviceTypes.type_id;
SELECT provider_name, contract_type FROM EnergyProviders WHERE contract_type = 'Fixed';
SELECT rate_id, rate, start_date, end_date FROM EnergyRates WHERE rate > 0.05;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN SmartHomeDevices ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = SmartHomeDevices.device_id;
SELECT device_name, device_type, energy_usage FROM SmartHomeDevices JOIN EnergyConsumptionData ON SmartHomeDevices.device_id = EnergyConsumptionData.device_id;
SELECT EnergyConsumptionData.device_id, energy_usage, rate FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN EnergyRates ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = EnergyRates.provider_id;
SELECT EnergyConsumptionData.device_id, energy_usage, provider_name FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN EnergyProviders ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = EnergyProviders.provider_id;

SELECT device_name, energy_usage, rate FROM SmartHomeDevices JOIN EnergyConsumptionData ON SmartHomeDevices.device_id = EnergyConsumptionData.device_id JOIN EnergyRates ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = EnergyRates.provider_id;

SELECT device_name, energy_usage, provider_name FROM SmartHomeDevices JOIN EnergyConsumptionData ON SmartHomeDevices.device_id = EnergyConsumptionData.device_id JOIN EnergyProviders ON EnergyConsumptionData.device_id = EnergyProviders.provider_id;
SELECT provider_name, rate FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyRates ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyRates.provider_id;
SELECT provider_name, energy_usage FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyConsumptionData ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyConsumptionData.device_id;
SELECT device_id, manufacturer FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, rate FROM SmartHomeDevices JOIN EnergyRates ON SmartHomeDevices.device_id = EnergyRates.provider_id;
SELECT type_id, device_type, rate FROM DeviceTypes JOIN EnergyRates ON DeviceTypes.type_id = EnergyRates.type_id;
